description: The 10-floor brothel in the German city of Cologne has filed for bankruptcy due to the pandemic.
title: Pascha: One of Europe's biggest brothels goes bust
title_page: Pascha: One of Europe's biggest brothels goes bust - BBC News
maintext: "We can't plan like that. We might have been able to avert bankruptcy with the help of the banks if we had been promised that things could start again at the beginning of next year," he said.
